text: How do I use a function that is defined in a parent module in an inner module?

elements.text: How do I use a function that is defined in a parent module in an inner module?

text:
One way:
```julia> module A
       f() = 1
       module B
       using ..A: f
       g() = f()
       end
       end
Main.A

julia> A.B.g()
1```

elements.text:
julia> module A
       f() = 1
       module B
       using ..A: f
       g() = f()
       end
       end
Main.A

julia> A.B.g()
1

text: Do I have to rename it? `import ..A: f`  doesn't seem to work directly.

elements.text: Do I have to rename it?

text: Works for me (as you can see in the example).

elements.text: Works for me (as you can see in the example).
